description:
Victor Nikiforov is a 27-year-old "living legend" who has garnered the attention of the world. He is a skater who has won five consecutive world championships. He is popular with men and women of all ages, and he has a rock star-like charisma. http://anidb.net/ch81292 [Yuuri] has been chasing after him since he was a child. Victor begins to take an interest in Yuuri for a strange reason.
Source: ANN
name: Victor Nikiforov
